aws_overwrite.prompt: AWS configuration already exists for trafodion id, overwrite

req_license.prompt: License detected, replace it with a new one

license_used.prompt: Enter full path to license file or the license string, input 'NONE' if no license

license_demo.prompt: Enter full path to license file or the license string, input 'DEMO' to use default license

traf_dirname.prompt: Enter directory name to install trafodion to

traf_log.prompt: Enter directory path for log files

traf_var.prompt: Enter directory path for temporary working files

core_loc.prompt: Enter core file folder location(should be a large disk)

dcs_ha.prompt: Enable virtual IP for High Avalability (requires floating IP address)

dcs_ha_keepalive.prompt: Floating IP address managed externally, such as keepalived (default is for DCS to manage)

dcs_floating_ip.prompt: Enter Floating IP address for DCS HA

dcs_interface.prompt: Enter interface for Floating IP address

hdfs_keytab.prompt: Enter fully qualified name for HDFS keytab

hbase_keytab.prompt: Enter fully qualified name for HBase keytab

max_lifetime.prompt: Enter max lifetime for Trafodion principal (valid format required)

max_renew_lifetime.prompt: Enter renew lifetime for Trafodion principal (valid format required)

krb_restart_all.prompt: Restart All DB services to take effect of Kerberos configuration

ldap_restart_dcs.prompt: Restart DCS services to take effect of LDAP authentication

ldap_hosts.prompt: Enter list of LDAP Hostnames (comma separated if more than one host)

ldap_port.prompt: Enter LDAP Port number (Example: 389 for no encryption or TLS, 636 for SSL)

ldap_identifiers.prompt: Enter all LDAP unique identifiers (semi-colon separated if more than one identifier)

ldap_encrypt.prompt: Enter LDAP Encryption Level (0: Encryption not used, 1: SSL, 2: TLS)

ldap_certpath.prompt: Enter full path to TLS certificate file (*.pem)

ldap_userinfo.prompt: Does the LDAP server require search user name/password

ldap_srch_grp_info.prompt: Does the LDAP server support group searches

ldap_srch_grp_obj_class.prompt: Enter LDAP search group object class

ldap_srch_grp_mem_attr.prompt: Enter LDAP search group member attribute

ldap_srch_grp_name_attr.prompt: Enter LDAP search group name attribute

scratch_locs.prompt:
Enter trafodion scratch file folder location(should be a large disk),
if more than one folder, use comma separated

local_repo_dir.prompt:
Enter local repository folder location or repository URL
to install trafodion RPM dependencies

java_home.prompt: Specify location of Java(JDK) on trafodion nodes

dcs_cnt_per_node.prompt: Enter number of DCS client connections per node

hadoop_package.prompt: Enter Hadoop package tar file location

hbase_package.prompt: Enter HBase package tar file location

hive_package.prompt: Enter Hive package tar file location

hive_home.prompt: Enter Apache Hive directory location if exists

mgr_url.prompt: Enter HDP/CDH web manager URL:port, (full URL, if no http/https prefix, default prefix is http://)

mgr_user.prompt: Enter HDP/CDH web manager user name

mgr_pwd.prompt: Enter HDP/CDH web manager user password

traf_package.prompt: Enter full path to Trafodion tar file

db_root_user.prompt: Enter user name to be assigned DB root privileges (DB__ROOT)

db_admin_user.prompt: Enter user name to be assigned DB Admin privileges

db_admin_pwd.prompt: Enter user password to be assigned DB Admin privileges

use_default_admin_password.prompt: Use default password for DB Admin?

master_node.prompt: Enter new DCS master node name (comma separated)

rsnodes.prompt:
Enter list of RegionServer Nodes separated by comma, support simple numeric Regular Expression,
 i.e. "n[01-12],n[21-25]","n0[1-5].com"

node_list.prompt:
Enter list of Trafodion Nodes separated by comma, support simple numeric Regular Expression,
 i.e. "n[01-12],n[21-25]","n0[1-5].com"

cluster_no.prompt: Select the above cluster number for installing Trafodion

traf_cluster_id.prompt: Enter a cluster ID for this Trafodion installation

use_rs_node.prompt: Install Trafodion nodes on all RegionServer Nodes

cgroups_cpu_pct.prompt: Enter the % CPU to use for EsgynDB services

cgroups_mem_pct.prompt: Enter the % Memory to use for EsgynDB services

enable_https.prompt: Enable HTTPS for DB Manager and REST Server

keystore_pwd.prompt: Enter Esgyn SSL Keystore password (at least 6 characters)

confirm_suse.prompt: SuSE OS detected, all RPM dependencies must be handled manually, continue

confirm_status.prompt: Continue with previous install status (all completed steps will be skipped)

traf_cluster_id.prompt: Enter a cluster ID for this EsgynDB installation

ssh_username.prompt: Enter user name to set up passwordless SSH for

cdh_nodes.prompt:
Enter list of Cloudera Nodes separated by comma, support simple numeric Regular Expression,
 i.e. "n[01-12],n[21-25]","n0[1-5].com"

ntp_server.prompt: Enter the NTP server for time synchronization

ntp_gateway.prompt: Enter the gateway of the LAN(used for NTP setting)

ntp_mask.prompt: Enter the subnet mask of the LAN(used for NTP setting)

iso_file.prompt: Enter the complete path of iso file or repository directory

security_selection.prompt: Enter one option you need to set (kerberos, ldap, local)

confirm_del_dcsmaster.prompt: Continue to delete Dcs master node

ldap_node.prompt: Enter one node to install OpenLADP

ldap_ha_node.prompt: Enter one node for LDAP HA

db_root_pwd.prompt: Enter LDAP user password to be assigned DB Root privileges

es_virtual_ip.prompt: Enter Virtual IP address for Elasticsearch and Logstash

use_lock.prompt: Enable Row Lock Function for Trafodion

mysql_package.prompt: Enter full path to Mysql package tar file

mysql_hosts.prompt:
Enter two nodes to install Mysql(separated by comma), support simple numeric Regular Expression,
 i.e. "n[01-12],n[21-25]","n0[1-5].com"

hadoop_list.prompt:
Enter list of Hadoop Nodes separated by comma, support simple numeric Regular Expression,
 i.e. "n[01-12],n[21-25]","n0[1-5].com"

pg_host.prompt: Enter one node to install Postgres

dfs_locs.prompt:
Enter NameNode and DataNode data folder location(should be a large disk),
if more than one folder, use comma separated

hadoop_tar.prompt: Enter full path to Hadoop tar file

patch_confirm.prompt: Incremental update will not replace the hbase-trx jar, the esgyn-common jar and Trafodion utility jar file. Continue to update
